label: DisposalInstructions
comment: A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.

objectProperties.comment: A textual description of these disposal instructions.
A code describing recycling in these disposal instructions.
The identifier of the material to which these disposal instructions apply.
A recycling procedure, expressed as text, for these disposal instructions.

referencedBy.comment: Transport waste disposal instructions specified for this logistics transport movement.
